doc:
Jenna Fischer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenna_Fischer 0 Regina Marie Fischer (born March 7, 1974) better known as Jenna Fischer, is an American actress best known for her portrayal of Pam Beesly on the NBC sitcom The Office, for which she was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series in 2007. Since then, Fischer has appeared in such films as Blades of Glory (2007), Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story (2007), The Promotion (2008), Hall Pass (2011), and The Giant Mechanical Man (2012), a film directed by her husband, Lee Kirk. She also appeared as Rhonda McNeil in the NBC's comedy-drama series You, Me and the Apocalypse. Fischer currently stars in the ABC sitcom Splitting Up Together (2018–). Fischer's first book, The Actor's Life: A Survival Guide, with an introduction by Steve Carell, was published in November 2017. Regina_Marie_Fischer ( born March_7_,_1974 ) better_known as Jenna_Fischer , is an_American_actress best_known for her_portrayal of Pam_Beesly on the_NBC_sitcom The_Office , for which she was_nominated for the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actress in a_Comedy_Series in 2007 . Since then , Fischer has_appeared in such_films as Blades of Glory_(_2007_) , Walk Hard : The_Dewey_Cox_Story_(_2007_) , The_Promotion_(_2008_) , Hall_Pass_(_2011_) , and The_Giant_Mechanical_Man_(_2012_) , a_film directed by her_husband , Lee_Kirk . She also appeared as Rhonda_McNeil in the_NBC 's_comedy-drama_series You , Me and the_Apocalypse . Fischer currently stars in the_ABC_sitcom Splitting Up Together_(_2018 – ) . Fischer 's_first_book , The_Actor 's_Life : A_Survival_Guide , with an_introduction by Steve_Carell , was_published in November_2017 .
